comment.brief:
The translation offset on the Z-axis.
This property is only meaningful if used with @RelativeTo set to @Local (the default).
This is mainly used for 3D transforms. For translation in the 2D plane,
use @X and @Y.
comment.full:
The translation offset on the Z-axis.
This property is only meaningful if used with @RelativeTo set to @Local (the default).
This is mainly used for 3D transforms. For translation in the 2D plane,
use @X and @Y.
